name: Svetlanya
desc: Adopted daughter of House Renald. Cares for all in her realm, but still desires to find her true purpose.

name: Amaya
desc: Former noblewoman of Omyrus, now a loyal retainer to Lady Miriam of Oestridel. She holds a strong desire to repay her debt to General Jethro.

name: Leiland
desc: Heir to House Renald and adoptive brother of Miriam. He dotes on her, but is stern with his duty.

name: Lukas
desc: A mysterious nobleman related to Count Garish Barrington. He seems to have taken a liking to Miriam...

name: Relm
desc: A mysterious young girl who is being hunted by the Nephyliae. She's actually Sister Kasuto's missing sister.

name: Baschtian
desc: Young master of a fallen house. He seeks to reclaim his honor.

name: Shayala
desc: Crown Princess of the Kingdom of Masa, sometimes called the Sage Princess. While powerful she still has room to grow.

name: Urso
desc: A Guardsman of Oestridel and scion of the Schenak merchant family.

name: Dehren
desc: A skilled mage from a far away land. Having resided in Oestridel for some time, he became a retainer for Lady Miriam.

name: Thanya
desc: Serena's aloof adopted daughter and close friend of Amaya.

name: Magne
desc: The young lord of Estbalc, on loan to House Renald to train as a knight.

name: Levyas
desc: Florina's elder brother, he went missing some time in the past. He has devoted his life to Lady Kasuto.

name: Joan
desc: A woman of Dorma who leads the local militia, and younger twin sister of Michelle. She hates all outsiders.

name: Michelle
desc: Elder twin sister of Joan, she seeks to make her fortunes outside the village to provide for her family.

name: Liena
desc: Lady Priscilla's handmaiden. She searches for Priscilla's son, Lord Baask.

name: Nala
desc:
A mysterious Lykon girl with an incredible power within her. Travels
in a caravan with her big sister.

name: Gwynn
desc: Amaya's younger brother. He longs to prove himself as a knight.

name: Galahn
desc: A Lykon hailing from the island nation of Avalar. He joined the knights to form stronger bonds between their nations.

name: Myleih
desc: An aspiring young recruit for the Kingdom and Baask's subordinate. Harbors a troubled past.

name: Jan
desc: A young man who abandoned home and country. Wields a terrible power in his hands.

name: Adrian
desc: A Lykon guard of Raugmina, distant relative of House Jemaih. Has a great interest in Liena...

name: Florina
desc: A beautiful woman of Avyon descent. She's seeking something very dear to her and won't rest until it is returned.

name: Tatsuru
desc: A scholar working for a mysterious shadow, but he tends to be a bit lazy.

name: Isabella
desc: The prodical daughter of House Toirahm currently acting as a mercenary for hire.

name: Josif
desc: Younger brother of Thanya and close friend of Gwynn.

name: Ioshua
desc: A sage-in-training from Jehanna. He reveres his teacher, Saleh.

name: Granye
desc: Lady of a noble house of Siegwang. She bears the blood of the dragons, but what does that even mean?

name: Kasuto
desc: A sister serving in the Church of Gaeya. She is a fountain of wisdom and beauty. She seems to have been looking for something.

name: Serena
desc: Miriam's former retainer promoted to Captain of the guard. Miriam looks up to her as a mentor. She has a young son, Josif, and a stepdaughter, Thanya.

name: Geval
desc: A berserker from Rausten. He’s a hearty man with a thirst for life.

name: Sherafima
desc: Former lady of House Leudona and Amaya's mother. She is a healer of great wisdom and prestige.

name: Melody
desc: A young girl living on the streets, despite being a noble's daughter...

name: Mikhail
desc: Archsage of Masa's Academy of Magic and survivor of the Tragedy of Muyre. He holds incredible power.

name: Gaeya
desc: Miriam's former retainer promoted to Captain of the guard. Miriam looks up to her as a mentor.

name: Jethro
desc: A courageous general in Grado’s army. He’s better known as Obsidian.

name: Yorwath
desc: A cavalier of Renais. He’s a devoted husband and a serene and quiet man.

name: Mariya
desc: Admiral Alder's widow, she has gone mad from the grief of the loss of her family. Lady Jezolda's twin sister.

name: Hanallel
desc:
A young Avyon woman of a fallen house,
the second of four Nephyliae siblings.
She is very loyal to her family.

name: Stubs
desc: A goofball lackey of the Bohanes Pirates. He's quite skilled but remains the butt of many jokes.

name: Yeuxi
desc: Joan's silent partner in the Dorma Village Militia. He goes along with whatever she says without question.

name: Shyara
desc: Leader of a group of desert dwelling barbarian lykons. Admires her elder sister Fayza deeply.

name: Fayza
desc: Fierce warrior woman from the Valley of Jehara. She values strength above all else and looks down upon the weak.

name: Troia
desc: First Mate of the Bohanes Pirates and adoptive sister of Dalton. She seeks to be the greatest pirate in the world.

name: Zajesh
desc: A Nephyliae drakoor mercenary, the second youngest of four siblings. Looks up to his big sis, Hanallel.

name: Katoshi
desc: A Lykon girl who seems to be acting as a spy for a mysterious group, disguised as a maid.

name: Kuentin
desc: A Knight Captain of the Kingdom of Omyrus' royal navy and head of House Leudona. Dotes on his daughter fondly.

name: Yarda
desc: Dehren's wife and matriarch of the family. Yarda has served as Miriam's handmaiden since Miram was a child.

name: Morgaine
desc: The youngest princess of the Kingdom of Masa, married to Lord Leiland and mother of his child. She harbors disdain for outsiders.

name: Liberius
desc: A drakoor mercenary for hire seeking to support his family. Husband of Florina.

name: Nadirah
desc: A woman hailing from the days dragons still roamed the land and a powerful arcanist. Great grandmother of Yarda.

name: Maieki
desc: Crown princess of Valynmur and younger sister of Florina.

name: Treiy
desc: A Knight Commander of the Kingdom of Masa, Serena's husband and father to Josif and Thanya.

name: Melodia
desc: The Lanquiz daughter of Jezolda and Garish. Wielding the Staff of Gaeya has unlocked incredible power within her.

name: Jezolda
desc:
Mother of Melodia and former Lady Barrington of Omyrus, now the
Lady of Feirwall. Mariya's twin sister.

name: Razulis
desc: A Zabos warrior who lost is way in life after the loss of his beloved daughter. Fiercely loyal to Drace Catacone.

name: Henry
desc: Former Admiral of the Kingdom of Omyrus, now a thrall of Drace. Dalton's strict and overbearing father.

name: Daniya
desc: A well known healer whose true colors have been revealed. She once took the guise of Drace Catacone. Daniyah was turned into a vampire by Mephisto and has long-since plotted her master's return.

name: Vyriel
desc: She was chosen as the heir to the Daemon Dragon, Mephisto. Inside her runs the blood of the Daemon Dragon and her ultimate power has been unleashed...

name: Mephisto
desc: The mindless body of the ancient Daemon Dragon, awakened by Daniya's will and desire. With his resurrection foiled, all that remains is to destroy his mindless body.

name: Azira
desc: The ancient hero of the Daemon Wars, revealed now in fact to have been the Daemon Dragon himself. Now his lingering will only desires to find its true end.
